text: Dana L. Belben (born May 12, 1978) is an American voice actress, animator, and comedian best known for being the first person to voice Giggles, Petunia and Cub in the animated web series Happy Tree Friends, to which she also served as a story editor. She also worked on several Sony Pictures Animation films and is currently working at Walt Disney Animation Studios. Category:American voice actors Category:1978 births Category:Living people
title: Dana Belben
